stimulusHtml: Which of the following gives the length of the curve defined by the parametric equations  x( t )= t 2 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3DCD@ and y( t )= t 3 3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3DD0@  from t=0 to t=1?
choicesHtml: ∫ 0 1 1+ t 2  dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4169@

∫ 0 1 1+4 t 2 dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@407B@

∫ 0 1 1+ t 4 dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3FBF@

∫ 0 1 t 2 + t 4 dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@410F@

∫ 0 1 t 4 4 + t 6 9 dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4345@
